titleSection.name: V1CruiseControl.NET Publisher
titleSection.shortDescription: Link agile workitems to tangible, working software in the form of builds.

descriptionSection.description: Link agile workitems to tangible, working software in the form of builds. This enables teams to measure progress in terms of working software and to identify problems sooner. This publisher creates a record of CruiseControl.NET builds in VersionOne, so the development teams can quickly view builds associated with a story or defect. This visibility is useful when identifying what build to use for verification or when generating release notes.

updates.releaseNotes:
* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy.
 * Added: Support for CruiseControl.NET 1.6.

qualityBands.name: seed
qualityBands.shortDesc: The initial idea of a product. No working code.

qualityBands.name: sapling
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.

mediaSection.title: Build Integration
mediaSection.caption: Integrate your build system to make it very clear which features/defects are contained in which builds.
